messages.subject: Re: help with mei on fuchi
messages.msgSnippet: Dear Mike, The last character eens to be KAO and not NAO as saied before. This character is used as trademark of . Sorry my poor english. I will try to
messages.messageBody:
Dear Mike,

The last character eens to be "KAO" and not "NAO" as saied before.
This character is used as "trademark of".
Sorry my poor english.
I will try to decifrate the other characteres.

Best Regards,
Rafael (Brasil-south america)

ps: I am an start colector (4 kodogu papered itens)

messages.subject: Re: [nihontostudy] help with mei on fuchi
messages.msgSnippet: Thank You Alan, Mark & Tom and all who helped.  I appreciate it! Mike
messages.messageBody:
Thank You Alan, Mark & Tom and all who helped. I appreciate it!
Mike

messages.subject: Re: [nihontostudy] help with mei on fuchi
messages.msgSnippet: Signed Kosetsuken Tomonao, worked in Mito, pupil of Hirano Tomomitsu, c.1846 Alan ... From: Michael Vinehout To: nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com Sent: Sunday,
messages.messageBody:
Signed Kosetsuken Tomonao, worked in Mito, pupil of Hirano Tomomitsu, c.1846
Alan
----- Original Message -----
From: Michael Vinehout
To: nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Sunday, March 26, 2006 7:19 PM
Subject: [nihontostudy] help with mei on fuchi


Jim & Alan and all,
Can you guys please take a look at the fuchi/kashira I have posted in
"Mike's" photo album. I am struggling with the mei. It is a very fine set
with a Oni theme, it looks like a diety is grapping the oni on the kashira.
Any help with the mei or the theme would be greatly appreciated. Here is
the link:

http://ph.groups.yahoo.com/group/nihontostudy/photos/browse/e3cc

or please look in Mike's photo album in the Nihonto Study group.
Thanks, Mike




------------------------------------------------------------------------------
YAHOO! GROUPS LINKS

a.. Visit your group "nihontostudy" on the web.

b.. To unsubscribe from this group, send an email to:
nihontostudy-unsubscribe@yahoogroups.com

c.. Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to the Yahoo! Terms of Service.


------------------------------------------------------------------------------
